ai-patthana8.57:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.57:1.1_0: by not seeing the Dhamma you should give up seeing, and by seeing causes and reasons.
ai-patthana8.57:2.1_0: not seeing the teaching with no eye, no cause or condition.
ai-patthana8.57:3.1_0: not seeing things that should be given up and not be given up by seeing, and by seeing causes and by seeing reasons.
ai-patthana8.57:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana8.57:4.1_0: ... five objects the result of the universal objects ...
